shoes.title: Adidas 4DFWD
shoes.subtitle: The Adidas 4DFWD impressed us from the start with its jaw-dropping midsole.

shoes.title: Hoka Bondi 8
shoes.subtitle: The 8th iteration of the Hoka Bondi remains our beloved plush and cushy daily trainer that excels on easy days and recovery sessions.

shoes.title: Adidas Harden Vol. 7
shoes.subtitle: We have reason to believe that nimble guards and big players are going to have lots of fun playing in Adidas Harden Vol. 7 shoes.
